events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated in several days.
The system has identified this case under the Delivery Delay category based on keywords like 'tracking' and 'hasn't arrived'.
An agent from the logistics support team has been assigned to this case to investigate the shipment delay.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about the delay with your delivery, and I will assist you right away.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so that I can look into the shipment status?
Sure, my order number is 2457891 and the tracking number is TRK123456789. The tracking hasn't changed since last week.
I've contacted our shipping partner and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. We expect your package to arrive within the next three business days.
Thanks for the update. I’m disappointed but I appreciate you checking into it and letting me know the expected arrival window.
We’ve updated your shipment details and you should receive the package soon. Please contact us if there are any further issues.
Just following up to check if your package has arrived and if everything is now satisfactory with your delivery.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday and everything was in good condition. Thanks for your help resolving this.
We are closing your case now as the delivery issue has been resolved. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
